turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I would like to place a Starbucks order for East Market Street in Harrisonburg, Virginia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay great. What kind of coffee did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a cinnamon dolce latte grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and which milk would you like it made with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like it with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great and did you want any extra syrup shots?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright so just to confirm that's a cinamon dolce Latte with coconut milk sized grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I'll place it with the starbucks on E. Marketplace. You'll get your reciept via text.
